competitors.name: Oracle/Siebel
competitors.notes: Oracle acquiring Siebel Systems in 2005 for $5.8B

competitors.name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM
competitors.notes: Microsoft entering CRM market, second largest market share

competitors.name: Zoho CRM
competitors.notes: Launched in 2005 as cloud CRM alternative

context: 2005 marked emergence of cloud CRM competitors. Zoho and HubSpot both launched around this time. Oracle acquired Siebel.
